title: Razer made some changes! - Barracuda X Gaming Headset
description: Get $25 off all pairs using offer code shortcircuit at   Gaming headsets are typically priced around the $200 range that includes almost everything you can think of; RGB, weird fancy shapes, super high-end material.  Razer went a different way with the Barracuda X, simple, yet affordable!  Buy Razer Barracuda X Gaming Headset On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Best Buy (PAID LINK):   Buy ASUS ROG PG259QN 360hz Gaming Monitor On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):  On B&H (PAID LINK):   Buy Logitech G915 TKL Wireless Keyboard On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):   Check out the Glorious Model O Wireless at   Check out the Maingear Turbo Gaming PC we used at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:  SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:    LTX EXPO:      AFFILIATES & REFERRALS --------------------------------------------------- Affiliates, Sponsors & Referrals:  Private Internet Access VPN:  Our Official Charging Partner Anker:  MK Keyboards:  Nerd or Die Stream Overlays:  Official Game Store:  Amazon Prime:  Audible Free Trial:  Our Gear on Amazon:    FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:     FOLLOW OUR OTHER CHANNELS ---------------------------------------------------   Linus Tech Tips:  TechLinked:  Mac Address:  Techquickie:    LMG Clips:  Channel Super Fun:  Carpool Critics:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 - Intro 0:31 - Unboxing 3:26 - First impressions 6:03 - Testing with Nintendo Switch 8:57 - Interesting issue 9:28 - Microphone test 10:33 - Gaming audio test 11:15 - Final thoughts
